  const pageSize = props.pageSize,
        currentPage = props.currentPage,
        orderBy = props.orderBy,
        search = props.search;
  let resultData = data.filter((row, idx) => idx < pageSize);
  let obj = {
    status: true,
    totalItem: pageSize.length,
    totalPage: 1,
    pageSize: pageSize.toString(),
    currentPage: currentPage.toString(),
    data: resultData
  };
  return obj;
};

export default getData;

const getData = (props) => {
